settings.name:
Never 
shoot
someone 
in the
glasses
settings.tutorial:
- Hold the mouse/start the touch and move to aim the gun and release to shoot.
- Just shoot ducks without glasses to earn points.
- Never shoot ducks with glasses, because you lose lives and points.
- Avoid the dark-eyed ducks because you lose lives.
